Installation

pip

pip install -U ciscoconfparse2 >= 0.7.9

requirements.txt: pypi

If you need a direct pypi dependency entry in your requirements.txt file, you can include an entry like this.

ciscoconfparse2 == 0.7.9

0.7.9 is used only as a reference; choose the correct release for your project.

requirements.txt: github

If you need a direct git dependency entry in your requirements.txt file, you can include an entry like this (where 0.7.9 is a specific git tag that you want to reference).

git+https://github.com/mpenning/ciscoconfparse2.git@0.7.9

0.7.9 is used only as a reference; choose the correct release for your project.
